frontMatter.title: Alphabet triangle pattern
frontMatter.description: Write a program to print alphabet triangle pattern

contentHtml:
Write a program to print alphabet triangle pattern

Input : 5
Output:
    A
   ABA
  ABCBA
 ABCDCBA
ABCDEDCBA
markdown:
## Write a program to print alphabet triangle pattern

```txt
Input : 5
Output:
    A
   ABA
  ABCBA
 ABCDCBA
ABCDEDCBA
```

---
